<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### ForgetSCEV {#af737928768744eeab93565688221d470}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const bool llvm::LoopFullUnrollPass::ForgetSCEV">
If true, forget all loops when unrolling.

If false, forget top-most loop of the currently processed loops, which removes one entry at a time from the internal <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> records. For large loops, the former is faster.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h/#l00037">37</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h">LoopUnrollPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OnlyWhenForced {#ab1db8f78670e486aa2b69fa3101030d9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const bool llvm::LoopFullUnrollPass::OnlyWhenForced">
If false, use a cost model to determine whether unrolling of a loop is profitable.

If true, only loops that explicitly request unrolling via metadata are considered. All other loops are skipped.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h/#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-h">LoopUnrollPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const int llvm::LoopFullUnrollPass::OptLevel">
